‘\w Your|strong="H5769"\w* ancestors, \w where|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w*? \w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H2421"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, do \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* ancestors? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w repented|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w planned|strong="H2161"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, according \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* according \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4611"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*.”’ The Lord’s Jealous Love for Zion

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w twenty-fourth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Shebat|strong="H7627"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*:

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* red \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w were|strong="H5483"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* valley-bottom. \w Behind|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w were|strong="H5483"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, red, \w sorrel|strong="H8320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w*, ‘\w My|strong="H7200"\w* Lord, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w*?’ \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H4397"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* among \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, ‘\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1980"\w* whom \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w patrol|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.’

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* riders \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w*, ‘\w We|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* world \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w peace|strong="H8252"\w*.’

d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w kind|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w comforting|strong="H5150"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, ‘\w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w now|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* deeply concerned \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am deeply \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* arrogant, complacent \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H7451"\w* only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* Israel \w but|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* made \w the|strong="H5921"\w* suffering \w worse|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w turning|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w show|strong="H7356"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w*

\w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w overflow|strong="H6327"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* choose \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.’ Destruction of the Heathen Powers
Now I looked up and saw four horns.
I said to the messenger who was talking with me, ‘What are these?’ He answered, ‘These are the horns which scattered Judah, Israel and Jerusalem.’
Then the \nd Lord\nd* showed me four smiths.

I said, ‘What are these coming to do?’ He answered, ‘The horns scattered Judah, so that no one dared lift their head. But the smiths have come to terrify them, to crush the horns of the nations which lifted up their horn against the land of Judah to scatter its people.’
